scripts.build: npm run build:transfer && npm run build:withdraw
scripts.build:transfer: cd src/circuits/transfer && nargo compile && bb write_vk_ultra_honk -b target/anon_transfer.json -o target/vk --oracle_hash keccak && node -e "const fs=require('fs');fs.writeFileSync('target/vk.json',JSON.stringify(Array.from(fs.readFileSync('target/vk'))))"
scripts.build:withdraw: cd src/circuits/withdraw && nargo compile && bb write_vk_ultra_honk -b target/anon_withdraw.json -o target/vk --oracle_hash keccak && node -e "const fs=require('fs');fs.writeFileSync('target/vk.json',JSON.stringify(Array.from(fs.readFileSync('target/vk'))))"
scripts.test:circuit: cd src/circuits/transfer && nargo test && cd ../withdraw && nargo test
